title: Barschel: A Murder in Geneva
occurrences: Excuse me, aren't you Mr. Barschel?
Barschel - Murder in Geneva
But you are Mr. Uwe Barschel, right?
Uwe Barschel?
(formal):"You want to do a movie abot Uwe Barschel?" "Yes, that's why I'm here...
So what? Why a film about Barschel? Who cares about that, that theme?..
"What was Barschel like?"
The film has to show clearly that Barschel was created by Stoltenberg and friends, which leads us to the next important person in my book
At first he pushed Barschel, but withdrew his support later on
Uwe Barschel was Head of Federal State, and he was the favorite for the upcoming federal elections in autumn
Barschel had to play it safe and had Springer Publishing House recommend him a man called Reiner Pfeiffer
But what did Pfeiffer and Barschel do specifically?
Finally, in september and early october Barschel had his assistants sign false affidavits and committed multiple acts of perjury himself.
Perhaps he had Barschel drop in it - but if so they would have dropped the bombshell way before the election!
I rather think that Pfeiffer has recognized Barschel's megalomania and backed out.
Barschel is rumored to have asked Pfeiffer to push a woman into the water so he could save her!
All those acts fit Barschel like a glove, he was an ice-cold power seeker!
Barschel worshipped Karl Donitz, that old Nazi. He even went to his funeral
There wouldn't be a Barschel case without journalists!
"Say, you don't give a fuck about that Barschel case, right?" "I'm sorry about your wife, I must have forgotten, sorry!"
On Sept. 25th Barschel resigns, on Oct. 2nd he hands his official duties over to Henning Schwarz, and on Oct. 6th Uwe and Freya Barschel go on holiday...
..Oct. 7th: Federal Minister of Finance Asmussen declared that Barschel had asked him about an anonymous tax claim against Engholm as early as january...
Barschel had planned on meeting Roloff in Madrid but then decided to meet in Genf at the Infopoint
Barschel tells his wife goodbye on Oct. 10, 7:30
Excuse me, aren't you Mr. Barschel?
But you are Mr. Uwe Barschel?
Uwe Barschel?
Either Robert Roloff doesn't exist and Barschel goes directly to the Hotel, not the Hilton where he had made reservations but the Beau Rivage to commit suicide...
But Roloff has nothing much to offer, Barschel realizes that his political career is over...
Quick magazine claims they have found Pietro Gattuso, the taxi driver who took Barschel to the city:
(bad italian accent) I took Barschel directly to the hotel. You can't even go around the ...
What's all this got to do with Barschel? There's numerous suspicious deaths every day - what's your point, exactly?
It might be possible that someone wanted to have Barschel killed but he commits suicide before he gets assassined, and the contract killer hides evidence to get his pay
Barschel arrives at the hotel at 16.30. He makes a few phone calls, and according to the people he called he sounds fairly optimistic.
Barschel made calls to his wife at 17:41,18:01 to his sister, Folke Junkers, and at 18:18. 18:28 and 19:08 to his brother
"Eike Barschel denied that third phone call" "Perhaps he needed a person he could trust"
I haven't seen Barschel even once throughout the entire time
A prostitute claimed to have seen Barschel at the foyer of the Beau Rivage around 17.30
They try to call Barschel at his room several times between 9.30 and 11.50 but he didn't answer
Barschel couldn't have done that as he was dead already by 11.00
Barschel might have taken small amounts of Diazepam and Nordiazepam before his flight,
Barschel has died almost exactly like recommended by the German society for humane assisted suicide - hotel room, drugs, bath tub, but...
they don't recommend any neuroleptika like perazin which was found on Barschel, as they rarely induce death, and if so then only with extreme pain
Barschel couldn't have taken the deadly Cyclobarbital first and then have removed all traces
There was this guest who arrived one day before Barschel and was given a room at the 2nd floor...
... but the day after he lived at the 3rd floor where Barschel was!
Barschel would have contacted such a person before but in Geneva he only had contact with his brother!
"And that guy also drank the bottle of red wine as Barschel had no alcohol in his blood?"
Maybe, but there were others who were interested in making Barschel disappear...
An informant told me that Barschel had ties with Adnan Kashoggi
Barschel had contacts in the DDR. He went there twice a year and was spied upon by the Stasi
Either Barschel made him up or somebody was luring him into a trap!
..but now that Barschel is there he stays at the "Le Richmonde" which is located right beside the Beau Rivage
On Sunday, Oct.11th, he leaves for Frankfurt at 12.51, just after Barschel had been found dead...
At the very same time in Geneva there are weapons dealers Adnan Kashoggi, Mansur Bilbassi, Josef Messerer, in whose notebook Barschel was mentioned
Was Barschel involved due to Stoltenberg? Were his DDR trips disguised weapons deals?
Ok, back to Gran Canaria: Barschel had been dropped by his own political party...
Barschel had become uncontrollable
I'll ask you once again: do we have your full support?... Ok, consider Barschel dead!
"...maybe to a conversation" "Barschel wasn't crazy, he wouldn't have gone with anyone!" "Why?..
Eike Barschel accuses the CDU and Stoltenberg that they had wanted his brother politically buried
...if they were able to kill Barschel then they could kill all of us!

A few weeks after the meeting between Parzer and Wittmeyer, Jean Grissen, a private investigator died in Zurich under suspicious circumstances. He had been hired by the Barschel family and was close to solving the case, according to Eike Barschel.
